about_the_game:
Looking for a bit more fantasy in your RPG Maker interiors? This is the perfect expansion pack to fill out those extra rooms. It offers both old-fashioned woodwork and stonework, plus a few early-modern options for mix and match variety. It comes with furniture for every room from the bedroom to the bathroom, as well as a plethora of miscellaneous items to scatter wherever you see fit. From telescopes to toilets and piggy banks to paintings, there’s a little something for every game!

Features:

* TileA2, A4, and A5 in wood, stone, and modern colour
* Full TileB and C of furniture, full TileD of items
* Full TileE of pre-arranged, item-laden furniture so your houses feel lived-in
* Animated wood and stone doors character sheet
* Curtained windows in transparent, day, sunset, and night
* 2 character sheets of items set at table height for easy cluttering
* 2 extra window skins with wood and stone borders
